meanings.definition: Relating to or showing an abnormal interest in corpses.
meanings.sent1: The necrophilic behavior of the character in the movie disturbed the audience.
meanings.sent2: The police investigated the necrophilic tendencies of the suspect.
meanings.sent3: The necrophilic fascination of the scientist with ancient mummies led to some interesting discoveries.
meanings.sent4: Her necrophilic obsession with old graveyards was like a moth drawn to a flame.
meanings.sent5: The artist's painting captured the eerie beauty of the necrophilic landscape.
